parameter.name: KikaiDB-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: Please provide the Offer Service database connection string.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=10.74.152.111; Initial Catalog=OfferDB;Integrated Security=False;User ID=offerDBUser;Password=offeruser;Connect Timeout=15;Encrypt=False;TrustServerCertificate=True

parameter.name: Update Provider Interval(MIN)
parameter.description: Please provider the time the provider information should be cached in the database.

parameter.name: PMP Store Server
parameter.description: Please provide the PMP Store server name

parameter.name: PMP Store DB
parameter.description: Please provide the PMP Store DB

parameter.name: PMP Store Username
parameter.description: Please provide the PMP Store username

parameter.name: PMP Store Password
parameter.description: Please provide the PMP Store password

parameter.name: Offer Service API User
parameter.description: Please provide the offer service API user

parameter.name: Offer Service APIUser password
parameter.description: Please provide the offer service APIuser password

parameter.name: Offer Service APIUser key
parameter.description: Please provide the offer service APIuser key

parameter.name: LiveMatch Endpoint Address
parameter.description: Please provide the endpoint for LiveMatch.

parameter.name: Respondent Catalog Endpoint Address
parameter.description: Please provide the endpoint for Respondent Catalog.

parameter.name: SNMP Agent
parameter.description: Please provide the hostname for SNMP Agent

parameter.name: File Log Level
parameter.description: Please provide the log level for the WebAPI log files

parameter.name: Monitor Log Level
parameter.description: Please provide the log level for the monitor log files
